Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
In OpenCms resource bundles are typically added via modules. Where to place the bundles inside the modules depends on which technique for bundles you use.

We encourage you to use one of the two OpenCms specific ways to work with resource bundles.
We are not talking about the bundles for workplace and (resource type independent) system dialog localization here. SeeÂ here for some description about such bundles. In this section we are concerned about the bundles for content specific localization of editors and website localization.
